group_1.textLeft: ...Express how I... No, how all of Daito feels@through my performance...?

group_1.textRight: Yes!

group_1.textLeft: ...In that case, let me run something by you@first...
About my speech here. Does it have to be filled@with anger?

group_1.textRight: Huh?!

group_1.textLeft: The climax might not be as exciting this way,@but...

group_1.textCenter: (We did adjust the general plotline together with@Togame-senpai and others...)
(But most of the lines will have to be@improvised...!)
(It's all up to you now, guys...!)

group_1.textRight: You'll repent...of your own will...? Even while@knowing you're able to move right now...?

group_1.textLeft: My pride is already in tatters, to be frank.
The decision to give up avenging my ancestors@didn't come lightly...

group_1.textRight: Then, why...

group_1.textLeft: Because, even though my clan and the townsfolk@have been opposing each other for so long...
...I was never able to find a clear reason why.
My clan would only pass down the past grudges and@bitterness they bore, not explanations.
But with time, I understood this: the more@oppression from town our kind would face...
The more we would retaliate in turn.
"Stop blaming us for our ancestors' faults!" ―@I'd always buried those words in my heart.
Eventually, it was no longer revenge that truly@motivated me to fight you lot.
The anger born from being made to put up with@oppression for no particular reason took over.

group_1.textRight: ...So that's how you felt...
And I was about to force a confession out of you@in these circumstances...

group_1.textLeft: My pride is wounded. My heart is seething with@rage.
Nevertheless...
I want to be forgiven.

group_1.textRight: ...And thus you're seeking a compromise.

group_1.textLeft: I know you and I both are sick of this@conflict.
My heart had already given up on receiving@forgiveness.
"I don't know how to apologize. Destroying my@enemy is the only way to break this cycle."
...That's what I convinced myself of.
And if you're just going to tell me that "it's@all in the past"...
Then not reciprocating your actions would just be@yet another disgrace to my name.
Let me say it once more...
I am remorseful for what I have done to this@point. Please forgive me.
...Is that enough repentance?

group_1.textRight: Yes, your confession is accepted!
Now, let me do the same...

group_1.textLeft: Why are you repenting too...?

group_1.textRight: I am speaking on behalf of the townspeople.
We unfairly oppressed you based on the past@quarrels of our ancestors...
Even though you didn't do anything to deserve it.
I hope you can find it in yourself to forgive us.

group_1.textLeft: ...Apology accepted.

group_1.textRight: Thank you.

group_1.textLeft: Haha, this feels kind of weird... It's like a@weight has been lifted off my shoulders.

group_1.textRight: I feel the same.
I'm sure you can start things over with the@townsfolk too, if that's what you wish for.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so... I would like to hope you're@right.

group_1.textRight: That aside, let me tell you something I've@noticed about you!
The town might see you vampires as the@incarnation of fear itself, but, hear me out!
After all the time I spent duking it out with@you, I came to realize this...
You guys just have a bit of a rough personality,@but you aren't bad by nature!

group_1.textLeft: What are you...

group_1.textRight: Their impression of you is wrong― that's the@whole issue!
They all cling to their irrational fears.
Your "terrifying vampire" reputation precedes@you.
As such, I'm gonna do all that's in my power to@help make others see you in a better light!

group_1.textLeft: ...@[chara:111600:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:111600:motion_000][chara:111600:cheek_0][chara:111600:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:111600:lipSynch_1]I am indebted to you...
Let's hold onto these feelings and start@tomorrow... Little by little...

group_1.textRight: The garlic harvest festival is still happening@tomorrow.

group_1.textLeft: ...Let's postpone those plans to the day after@tomorrow, then...

group_1.narration: "Thus the sister and the vampire joined hands in friendship,@bidding farewell to their long conflict."
"And they all lived happily ever after."

group_1.textLeft: The play was a lot of fun~

group_1.textRight: For some reason... I feel really thankful to@everybody for putting it together!

group_1.textLeft: Everybody did a great job~ I simply loved it~

group_1.textRight: The play was a success! It's all thanks to you,@Nagitan!

group_1.textLeft: I'm happy to hear that.

group_1.textRight: ...And once more, I'm really sorry.
For not being considerate enough while writing@the script for the play...

group_1.textLeft: What matters is that the play was a success.
Moreover, it left me feeling refreshed from@the bottom of my soul.
Take pride in your work. You have nothing to@be ashamed of.

group_1.textRight: T-thank you a bunch...!

group_1.textLeft: I'm feeling refreshed, too...
I mean, I got so into it that some of my own@feelings might have slipped in there...

group_1.textRight: Ah. Your acting was awesome, though!
A moment if you would, Kanagi?

group_1.textLeft: Hm? Is something up?

group_1.textRight: That resolution to the story... Is that how you@honestly feel?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:111600:lipSynch_1]Who can tell? Not me.

group_1.textRight: Who, indeed...

group_1.textLeft: If I had to say, this was a desirable, highly@idealized outcome...
If somebody suddenly asked me to let go of@everything that happened and call it even for real...
Would I be able to muster the same words in@response?
I really...don't know the answer to that...

group_1.textCenter: A lot happened, but this Halloween was a fun one.
